events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Software Engineering department for further processing.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to guide you through the process.
Your initial screening interview is scheduled and we look forward to discussing your software development experience.
Thank you for the invitation. I am available on the proposed date and eager to participate in the screening.
We have scheduled your technical interview with our senior developer team to further assess your coding skills.
